field_label: China document legalization – standard documents (e.g., no-criminal-record cert, diploma without appendix, marriage/birth/death certificates, statutes, workbooks)
notes: Registration deadline: 7 working days. Price: 18,000 RUB per document. Price includes Chinese translation + notarization; submission to Ministry of Justice, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and Chinese Embassy Consular Dept; consular fee. Courier delivery not included.

field_label: China document legalization – standard documents (same group) – urgent
notes: Registration deadline: 3 working days. Price: 28,000 RUB per document. Same inclusions as standard. Courier delivery not included.

field_label: China document legalization – ID documents (foreign passport, driver’s license, military ID card)
notes: Registration deadline: 7 working days. Price: 18,000 RUB per document. Requires notarized copy. Includes translation + notarization and all submission/consular fees.

field_label: China document legalization – ID documents (foreign passport, driver’s license, military ID card) – urgent
notes: Registration deadline: 3 working days. Price: 28,000 RUB per document. Requires notarized copy. Includes translation + notarization and all submission/consular fees.

field_label: China document legalization – diploma with appendix
notes: Processing time and price: on request.
Copies of foreign passport(s) + Russian internal passport (photo page + registration) for all persons mentioned in the document (e.g., spouses for a marriage certificate).
Registration deadline: 12 working days. Price: 13,000 RUB.
Registration deadline: 8 working days. Price: 14,000 RUB.
